response.overview: "Ary Jansen’s Breadcrumb Trail mixes machinima with dash-cam footage. Virtual cities mapped by the reward-seeking logics of gaming bleed into the banal journey of a single-car commute up Auckland’s Southern Motorway, over which plays a soundtrack of music and conversations between Jansen and his activist-peers on finding collectivity and belonging within the hostile environment of the Capital-hungry city." - Connie Brown, The Art Paper
response.title: Breadcrumb Trail
